snippet: Before the Scots vote on whether to become an independent nation, they should weigh all the pros and cons of leaving the United Kingdom.
abstract: Editorial urges Scotland to carefully consider whether it should secede from Britain, with Sept 18 Scottish referendum only seven months off; cautions serious debate on secession should weigh not only whether Scotland would be better off economically, but whether breaking one great state into two lesser ones is better for either.
lead_paragraph: Before the Scots vote on whether to become an independent nation, they should weigh all the pros and cons of leaving the United Kingdom.
